tool_description: Creates and optimizes icon sets for mobile app interfaces, ensuring consistency, scalability, and platform compliance.

icon_style.description: Icon style: outline, filled, duotone, or mixed

icon_categories.description: Categories of icons needed (navigation, action, social, media, etc.)

primary_color.description: Primary icon color in hex format

platform_specs.description: Platform specification: ios, android, or universal

corner_radius.description: Corner radius for rounded icons (0-50% of icon size)

error_messages: Invalid icon style: Use outline, filled, duotone, or mixed
Invalid primary color: Provide color in hex format (e.g., #333333)
Invalid icon sizes: Provide sizes between 12 and 512 pixels
Invalid platform specs: Use ios, android, or universal
Invalid corner radius: Value must be between 0 and 50
usage: Specify icon_style, icon_categories, and primary_color; optionally configure icon_sizes, platform_specs, and corner_radius to generate a complete icon set.

size_variations.description: Available size variations for each icon

usage_guidelines.description: Best practices for using the generated icons
